Class Zombie

java.lang.Object
model.zombies.Zombie
Direct Known Subclasses:
BucketHeadZombie, ConeheadZombie, FlagZombie, NormalZombie, PoleVaultingZombie
public abstract class Zombie extends Object
Base class for all zombie types. Implements common behaviour such as movement, attacking and taking damage.

  • Constructor Details

    • Zombie

      public Zombie(int h, int bs, int d, Tile pos)
      Constructs a zombie with the given attributes.
      Parameters:
      h - starting health
      bs - base movement speed in ticks
      d - damage dealt to plants
      pos - starting tile position on the board

  • Method Details

    • move

      public void move(Tile[][] board)
      Moves the zombie one tile to the left on the given board.
      Parameters:
      board - current board grid used to update tile occupancy

    • setPosition

      public void setPosition(Tile position)
      Updates the tile reference that this zombie occupies.
      Parameters:
      position - new tile position

    • setGameEventListener

      public void setGameEventListener(GameEventListener l)
      Registers a game event listener for callbacks related to this zombie.
      Parameters:
      l - listener implementation

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage(int amount)
      Parameters:
      amount - damage to apply

    • freezeFor

      public void freezeFor(int ticks)
      Freezes the zombie for the specified number of ticks.
      Parameters:
      ticks - how long the zombie will remain frozen

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates internal timers such as freeze state each tick.

    • attack

      public void attack(Tile[][] board)
      Attacks the plant on the current tile if one exists. The Tile[][] board is never used here. It is only used by the PoleVaultingZombie for jump purposes during its first attack

    • isAlive

      public boolean isAlive()
      Checks if this zombie still has health remaining.
      Returns:
      true if health is above zero

    • getPosition

      public Tile getPosition()
      Returns:
      current tile occupied by the zombie

    • getBaseSpeed

      public int getBaseSpeed()
      Returns:
      zombie's original speed value

    • getSpeed

      public int getSpeed()
      Returns:
      current movement speed factoring in modifiers

    • getHealth

      public int getHealth()
      Returns:
      current health value

    • getDamage

      public int getDamage()
      Returns:
      damage dealt when attacking a plant

    • getFreezeTimer

      public int getFreezeTimer()
      Returns:
      remaining ticks that this zombie is frozen
